verses.verse: Now <S%H3503>Jethro,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' father-in-law, <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> for Moses and for <S%H3478>Israel<s%> His <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3588>how<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
And <S%H3503>Jethro,<s%> Moses' father-in-law, <S%H3947>took<s%> Moses' <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H6855>Zipporah,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H7971>sent<s%> her <S%H7971>away,<s%>

and her <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H1647>Gershom,<s%> for he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have <S%H1961>been<s%> a <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> in a <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>"

And the <S%H259>other<s%> was <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H461>Eliezer,<s%> for [he said,] "The <S%H430>God<s%> of my father was my <S%H1>help,<s%> and <S%H5828>delivered<s%> me from the <S%H5337>sword<s%> of <S%H2719>Pharaoh.<s%>"

Then <S%H3503>Jethro,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' father-in-law, <S%H935>came<s%> with his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> to Moses in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he was <S%H2583>camped,<s%> at the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

And he <S%H559>sent<s%> <S%H559>word<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "I, your father-in-law <S%H3503>Jethro,<s%> am <S%H935>coming<s%> to you with your <S%H802>wife<s%> and her <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> with her."

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H7122>meet<s%> his father-in-law, and he <S%H7812>bowed<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him; and they <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H7453>other<s%> of their <S%H7965>welfare,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H168>tent.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5608>told<s%> his father-in-law <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and to the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> for Israel's <S%H5921>sake,<s%> <S%H182><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8513>hardship<s%> that had <S%H4672>befallen<s%> them on the <S%H1870>journey,<s%> and [how] the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them.

And <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> <S%H2302>rejoiced<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9186>goodness<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> in <S%H5337>delivering<s%> them from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

So <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> and from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> [and] <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> from <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H430>gods;<s%> <S%H3588>indeed,<s%> it was <S%H1697>proven<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> they <S%H2102>dealt<s%> <S%H2102>proudly<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the people."

Then <S%H3503>Jethro,<s%> Moses' father-in-law, <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> for <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> a <S%H3899>meal<s%> with Moses' father-in-law <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H4283>day<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>about<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> from the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

Now when Moses' father-in-law <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that he was <S%H6213>doing<s%> for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> that you are <S%H6213>doing<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%>? <S%H4069>Why<s%> do you <S%H905>alone<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> [as judge] and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5324>stand<s%> <S%H5921>about<s%> you from <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening<s%>?"
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his father-in-law, <S%H3588>"Because<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to me to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> they <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H1697>dispute,<s%> it <S%H935>comes<s%> to me, and I <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and <S%H3045>make<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> and His <S%H8451>laws.<s%>"
And Moses' father-in-law <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "The <S%H1697>thing<s%> that you are <S%H6213>doing<s%> is not <S%H2896>good.<s%>

"You will <S%H5034>surely<s%> <S%H5034>wear<s%> out, <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H859>yourself<s%> and <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are with you, for the <S%H1697>task<s%> is <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H3515>heavy<s%> for you; you <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> it <S%H905>alone.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me: I shall <S%H3289>give<s%> you <S%H3289>counsel,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> be with you. You be the people's representative <S%H4136>before<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and you <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H1697>disputes<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%>

then <S%H2094>teach<s%> them the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H8451>laws,<s%> and <S%H3045>make<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> to them the <S%H1870>way<s%> in which they are to <S%H1980>walk,<s%> and the <S%H4639>work<s%> they are to <S%H6213>do.<s%>

"Furthermore, you shall <S%H2372>select<s%> out of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2428>able<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H571>truth,<s%> those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H1215>dishonest<s%> <S%H1215>gain;<s%> and you shall <S%H7760>place<s%> [these] <S%H5921>over<s%> them, [as] <S%H8269>leaders<s%> of <S%H505>thousands,<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> of <S%H2572>fifties<s%> and of <S%H6235>tens.<s%>

"And let them <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>times;<s%> and let it be that <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1419>major<s%> <S%H1697>dispute<s%> they will <S%H935>bring<s%> to you, but <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9512>minor<s%> <S%H1697>dispute<s%> they themselves will <S%H8199>judge.<s%> So it will be <S%H7043>easier<s%> for you, and they will <S%H5375>bear<s%> [the burden] with you.

<S%H518>"If<s%> you <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> [so] <S%H6680>commands<s%> you, then you will be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5975>endure,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> will <S%H935>go<s%> to their <S%H4725>place<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>"
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to his father-in-law, and <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that he had <S%H559>said.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H2428>able<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> out of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5414>made<s%> them <S%H7218>heads<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H8269>leaders<s%> of <S%H505>thousands,<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> of <S%H2572>fifties<s%> and of <S%H6235>tens.<s%>

And they <S%H8199>judged<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>times;<s%> the <S%H7186>difficult<s%> <S%H1697>dispute<s%> they would <S%H935>bring<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> but <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9512>minor<s%> <S%H1697>dispute<s%> they themselves would <S%H8199>judge.<s%>
Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>bade<s%> his father-in-law <S%H7971>farewell,<s%> and he <S%H1980>went<s%> his way into his own <S%H776>land.<s%>
